title: PMS 2.0 537 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 10 Preview, Peter Schrager, Maurice Jones-Drew, Coach Jason Brown & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ, and the boys chat about last night's Thursday Night Football game between the Ravens and Dolphins and if the Dolphins and Tua may finally be turning a corner, how we still don't know anything about the NFL, before looking ahead to week 10 of the NFL season and picking every game against the spread (:35-11:18, 42:49-54:29). Next, FOX NFL Insider, co-host of Good Morning Football, co-host of the Flying Coach Podcast with Sean McVay and friend of the show, Peter Schrager joins the program to chat about how OBJ to the Rams actually played out, whose idea it is to go for broke this year in LA, the search for the other co-host of Good Morning Football, and everything else going on in the NFL (11:18-31:25). Later, 9 year NFL veteran at Running Back, 3x Pro Bowler, 3x All-Pro, NFL Network Analyst, and color commentator for the LA Rams, Maurice Jones-Drew joins the show to chat about the Rams going for all-in this year, blocking as a young Running Back in the NFL, what he thinks is going on with Jacksonville, the Packers managing their 2 back stable for the rest of the season, and much more (1:00:34-1:23:47). Lastly, Coach Jason Brown joins the show for his weekly segment making his college football picks for the weekend (1:24:56-1:48:39). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
